reviewtext: I gave this HT Power Center 5 stars based on the price. I didn't need a power center and only bought it for the "power cleaning" or "noise filtering". I just finished upgrading my home theater...TV, AVR, and new sub. I came across an article in a Crutchfield catalog that listed this item as a good economy power filter and their test data showed that it worked well. So, for $27 I figured why not. I have no way of measuring before and after so I have no idea if it did anything for me. But again, Crutchfield said it works.
